name: Yoko Ono's "Grapefruit" [Mixtape]
description:
All pieces by Yoko Ono, as published in the 1970 version of her book, Grapefruit.

This Twine was created for educational purposes as a demonstration to my "Creating Digital Games as Art Practice" class, inspired by this article by Katherine Cross, and the fact these students will soon be working on their own Twine creations.
